cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRIT AM IC MAJESTY' S GOVERNS?)SECRET. CABINET,O.P. 2744,, MESOPOTAMIA.Telegram from Prime Minister to Mr. Churchill of18th March, 1921.(Circulated with reference to 0CP* 2742 andO.P. 2743).Pending oonsidoration by Cabinet I give provisional approval in prinoiple to proposals contained in first part of your telegram of 16th March. Proposals in part relating tf Irak as to procedure in regard to Emir Faisal require further consideration in view of difficulties explained In my telegram' of March 16th. Shall hope to telegraph in regard to this and to Kurdistan part of your telegram early next week.Whitehall Gardens, S.W. 18th March, 1921...
